column4: I need help moving a home directory to a new partition on a seperate harddrive.
I've copied the directory and changed fstab, but I keep geting an error on restart
gives us  a link to have look at fstab
I assume sda7 is right, and add :      ,user  to defaults

^peanut^, just found out not all of my files moved last time (X crashed and I thought I gave it enought time).  Should take a few hours, but I think it was manly the premissions, so I'll fix that and try again.
use rsync -u, so can save time
rsync may also be interrupted and can be continued later
^peanut^:  everything is copied over and worked with reboot.  Thanks for the help
